name: Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, fka Credit Suisse First Boston LLC, et al. v. Billing et al.
court: Supreme Court of the United States

involvedParties.name: Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, fka Credit Suisse First Boston LLC

reasoningForIncluding.name: Silver v. New York Stock Exchange
Gordon v. New York Stock Exchange, Inc.
United States v. National Assn. of Securities Dealers, Inc.

allegedUnlawfulAgreement.name: Not sell newly issued securities to a buyer unless the buyer committed (1) to buy additional shares of that security later at escalating prices (known as “laddering”), (2) to pay unusually high commissions on subsequent security purchases from the underwriters, or (3) to purchase from the underwriters other less desirable securities (known as “tying”).
